column4: how would i uninstall something that was installed via this command - sudo dpkg --force-architecture -i mmc_1.7.0_i386.deb
i tried sudo dpkg -r mmc_1.7.0_i386.deb, but all it does is bring up the software center saying it can't install it because of wrong architecture
what about apt-get remove blah.deb? - lol i know urs is ... more knowledgeable though
